faqs_answer_sec_1: DREAM FOR LYF is a relationship marketing company (direct sales) which offers a wide range of products in the areas of: Ayurveda food supplements (plant-based), health, well-being, personal care via a platform e-commerce. DREAM FOR LYF'S products are made to help people live healthier and improve their lifestyles and livelihoods. The multinational conglomerate is based in India and DREAM FOR LYF is the official distributor.
faqs_answer_sec_2: It's started its operations in Africa and in the coming years it will expand its relationship marketing activities (direct sales). In addition to providing quality products, DREAM FOR LYF customers can also benefit from the relationship marketing activity (direct sales) offered by DREAM FOR LYF by promoting its products to others (Families, Friends and acquaintances). Millions of satisfied customers in several cities and countries have become independent distributors of DREAM FOR LYF products by earning commissions on product sales.

faqs_answer_2_sec_1: NO. We are a legitimate relationship marketing (direct selling) business where you only pay to purchase products. If you are interested in becoming a distributor of DREAM FOR LYF products, you can send us a mail at
faqs_answer_2_sec_2: If anyone has misrepresented our company or any of our DREAM FOR LYF products, please report it to us by sending an email to
faqs_question_3: SHOULD I RECRUIT OTHER PEOPLE TO MAKE MONEY?
faqs_answer_3_sec_1: YES. You can recruit as many people as you want, but DREAM FOR LYF only recommends two people to whom you can sell our products and start building your team. When your system becomes automatic; this is the goal of all distributors you can earn very large commissions every day, week and month without recruiting anyone your whole life.
faqs_answer_3_sec_2: However, please know that the innovation of our plan allows you as a distributor in your beginnings as a new person when you join our company DREAM FOR LYF by purchasing our products to earn a first commission only once without having first recruited person.
faqs_answer_3_sec_3: This bonus is called: BUY AND EARN (REGISTER AND EARN). But if you want to earn enough money from sales commissions, build your team by continuing to recruit and above all train your team members so that they become like you so that your system becomes automatic. Recruitment in relational marketing (direct sales) is not for life with just two business partners you can build your system and succeed, you just need to train them so that they become like you better than you.
faqs_answer_4_sec_1: Direct selling is a method of marketing and retailing goods and services directly to consumers, at their homes or other locations away from permanent retail premises. This type of sales depends largely on word of mouth.
faqs_answer_4_sec_2: Products sold through direct sales companies have unique features and are exclusive to the company and are not available in malls or department stores.
faqs_answer_4_sec_3: The direct selling industry has thrived on this relationship marketing for over 150 years. Around 100 million people worldwide are involved in this industry on a part- time and full-time basis.
faqs_question_5: SO WHY NOT JOIN DREAM FOR LYF AND START MAKING MONEY WITH US?
faqs_answer_5_sec_1: Let's say you get dressed by a talented fashion designer in your neighbourhood who creates tailor-made outfits to meet your exact needs and those of all of his clients. To increase its turnover, it wishes to exploit your network of contacts (Family, Friends, Colleagues, Acquaintances) to recommend its services and help promote its products.
faqs_answer_5_sec_2: The principle of your partnership is simple and here it is: for each parent, friend, colleague and acquaintance to whom you recommend their services and who comes to sew their clothes at home in their workshop, you have a percentage of 10% on the turnover generated.
faqs_answer_5_sec_3: For example, if your best friend, who already appreciates the quality of sewing of your shirts, pants and others, agrees to come and sew his clothes for your designer and pays 100 dollars, you have a commission of 10 dollars. This is valid for each order from your friend.
faqs_answer_5_sec_4: You explain the same principle to your friend who agrees to do the same thing with his friends, family, colleagues, acquaintances. And so on.
faqs_answer_5_sec_5: In this partnership, you earn just like your designer. From then on, you are in a win-win partnership. Using the designer's products (Shirts, Pants, Suits, etc.) and recommending them to your loved ones is what we call word-of-mouth marketing or relationship marketing (direct sales).
faqs_answer_5_sec_6: Today, many companies are leveraging this marketing system to increase their revenue and increase their market share internationally and globally. One of his companies and the best one currently is called DREAM FOR LYF.
faqs_question_6: HOW CAN I MAKE MONEY WITH DREAM FOR LYF?
faqs_answer_6_sec_1: The only way to earn income with DREAM FOR LYF is to sell products to at least two people and build your team. Once you use our products, like them, and recommend others to buy them, you can earn commissions on actual sales. DREAM FOR LYF uses a compensation plan that calculates commissions payable to you based on the sales volume generated by your team on our e-commerce portal.
faqs_answer_6_sec_2: Many entrepreneurs have taken advantage of our business model to build large sales teams and grow a successful business.
faqs_question_7: HOW LONG CAN I EARN MONEY WITH DREAM FOR LYF?
faqs_answer_7_sec_1: Direct selling is an activity like any other. This is not a get-rich-quick scheme. To succeed in this profession, you must work hard, seriously, be patient, committed, be concentrated and focused on your goals. This business gives you the opportunity to become an entrepreneur.
faqs_answer_7_sec_2: The only difference is that you don't have to worry about a large-scale start-up cost or operational overhead like a traditional business. Your success depends entirely on you and the hard work you put in.
faqs_question_8: POSSIBILITY OF FLEXIBLE WORK AND SELF-EMPLOYMENT
faqs_answer_8_sec_1: The direct selling industry laid the foundation for what we know today as the gig economy and has paved the way for flexible working and self-employment opportunities for over a century.
faqs_answer_8_sec_2: This is an exciting industry that offers you a personalized business model to sell your products or services without the constraints of a traditional retail outlet.

ethics_top_message_1: DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL requires all Independent Distributors (IDs) to respect the principles of fairness, honesty and integrity in all their dealings and activities as an Independent Distributor.
ethics_top_message_2: This code of ethics explains good business conduct to you, and is part of the policies and procedures of DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL and all other regulations and agreements currently in force, which bind each independent distributor. Any serious violation of the Code, Policies and Procedures, regulations and agreements in place will involve one or more actions taken by DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL in accordance with the DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL Policies and Procedures.
ethics_top_message_3: In addition, DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL encourages all independent distributors to obtain and respect the Code of Ethics which has been established by the CEO and all managers and high authorities of this company. This document is valid and must be strictly applied by all independent distributors in their respective countries.
ethics_top_message_4: It is mandatory that independent distributors comply with the code of ethics at all times.
ethics_sub_heading_part_1: I) BEHAVIOR WITH THE GENERAL PUBLIC
ethics_part_1_summary_1: 1) Will at all times respect the privacy and wishes of the person contacted, either from a telephone list or by other means;
ethics_part_1_summary_2: 2) Will never engage in improper, abusive, unfair or aggressive conduct when contacting or dealing with another person in connection with DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL or the opportunities offered
ethics_part_1_summary_3: 3) Will respect the provisions of the law and good manners regarding times and days when calling and making appointments.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_description_info: An independent distributor who presents the business plan by organizing events such as: seminars, conferences, meetings, training:
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_1: 1) Shall not misrepresent to anyone any details regarding the financial rewards available under the DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL plan.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_2: 2) Shall not make false or misleading statements about the functionality of DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL's products, services and programs, including as to their standard, quality, value, features, accessories, uses for a particular purpose, merchantability or benefits;
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_3: 3) Shall not make false or misleading statements about the price of DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL products;
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_4: 4) Shall not engage in any conduct likely to mislead anyone as to the nature, manufacturing process, characteristics, fitness for purpose or quality of any DREAM FOR LYF product INTERNATIONAL ;
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_5: 5) Must make it clear to any person with whom the Independent Distributor discusses the desirability that financial rewards given to Independent Distributors are based on the individual performance of an (ID);
ethics_sub_part_1_i_1_summary_6: 6) Use official documentation approved by DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL, including forms, scripts and other tools.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_1: 1) Taking advantage of another person's disabilities or weaknesses, such as illness, age, infirmity, lack of education or ignorance of the language (the list is not exhaustive) and advising them one or more products that do not correspond to the prospect's illness or sell them expired products, sell them the products at very high prices which do not correspond to the prices recommended by the company.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_2: 2) Refusing to identify himself when asked to do so.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_3: 3) Register minors or any other persons without legal capacity without their consent, or parental agreement (verbal or written).
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_5: 5) Disparage DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL while claiming to be an authorized person or employee of DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL or damage the good reputation of DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL in any way.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_6: 6) Providing false information or making misrepresentations about the registration process or compensation plan.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_7: 7) Steal and divert the dowlines of a leader already registered with DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL and direct them towards other companies.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_8: 8) Steal and divert the dowlines of a DREAM FOR LYF INTERNATIONAL registered leader by destroying his reputation and using lies and inappropriate means in order to recover the members of his team who are already registered under him and register them under you in your team.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_9: 9) Steal and embezzle a new member's sign-up, registration money.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_10: 10) Confiscate the account details of one of his downlines without his consent, or verbal or written agreement.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_11: 11) Fraudulently withdraw commissions from the accounts of your dowlines.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_12: 12) Mistreat and abuse the trust of your dowlines, prospects, partners and collaborators.
ethics_sub_part_1_i_2_summary_13: 13) Smear and denigrate the image and reputation of the CEO as well as the various managers, partners, employees and high authorities of the company.
